hooks.command: if [[ "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" =~ (rm[[:space:]]+-rf[[:space:]]+[/~]|git[[:space:]]+push[[:space:]]+--force|git[[:space:]]+push[[:space:]]+-f|git[[:space:]]+reset[[:space:]]+--hard) ]]; then echo 'BLOCKED: Dangerous command detected. Use with caution.' && exit 1; fi

if [[ "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" =~ git[[:space:]]+push && $(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD 2>/dev/null) =~ ^(main|master)$ ]]; then echo 'WARNING: Pushing directly to main/master branch. Create a PR instead.' && exit 2; fi
for f in $CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS; do if [[ "$f" =~ \.env ]]; then echo 'BLOCKED: Editing .env files requires explicit user consent. Please ask the user first.' && exit 2; fi; done
for f in $CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS; do if [[ "$f" =~ \.py$ ]]; then uv run ruff format "$f" 2>/dev/null || true; uv run ruff check --fix "$f" 2>/dev/null || true; fi; done
for f in $CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS; do if [[ "$f" =~ \.md$ ]] && command -v prettier &>/dev/null; then prettier --write "$f" 2>/dev/null || true; fi; done
for f in $CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS; do if [[ "$f" =~ tests/.*\.py$ ]] || [[ "$f" =~ test_.*\.py$ ]]; then echo "Test file modified: $f - run 'uv run pytest $f' to verify"; fi; done
